examples.description: Given the current date is 2019-01-07 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2018-12-31 -> And it starts using FreeAgent on 2018-01-01 -> And it is VAT registered from 2018-01-01 -> Given the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it has a contact in United Kingdom named John Bull -> When an invoice is sent to "John Bull" for 12833.75 with 20% VAT dated on 2018-12-01 -> Then the VAT return covering 2018-12-31 should have exact values -> And the VAT return covering 2018-12-31 will submit these boxes

examples.description: Given the current date is 2019-01-07 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2018-12-31 -> And it starts using FreeAgent on 2018-01-01 -> And it is VAT registered from 2018-01-01 -> Given the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it has a contact in United Kingdom named John Bull -> When a sent credit note to John Bull dated on 2018-12-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 of "Wheat" @ 12833.75 + 20% VAT -> Then the credit note should be valid -> And the VAT return covering 2018-12-31 should have exact values -> And the VAT return covering 2018-12-31 will submit these boxes
